body_html: Well, from the error something is adding a dependency on one of Adam's slot variables; do you use the output of optimizer.variables() somewhere? Or tf.global_variables()? Assigning one of those to an attribute could add the dependency.
body_text: Well, from the error something is adding a dependency on one of Adam's slot variables; do you use the output of optimizer.variables() somewhere? Or tf.global_variables()? Assigning one of those to an attribute could add the dependency.
body: Well, from the error something is adding a dependency on one of Adam's slot variables; do you use the output of `optimizer.variables()` somewhere? Or `tf.global_variables()`? Assigning one of those to an attribute could add the dependency.
